problem_statement: The AI Maze Solver is designed to find a valid path from a start point to a goal within a maze. The maze may include obstacles, dead ends, and multiple possible paths. A test suite is required to verify correct maze interpretation and path generation. The tests ensure the solver avoids obstacles and handles edge cases correctly.
FAIL_TO_PASS: Req 1: maze generation creates valid start position
Req 2: maze generation creates valid goal and boundaries
Req 3: BFS finds valid path in solvable maze
Req 4: DFS finds valid path in solvable maze
Req 5: A* finds valid path in solvable maze
Req 6: algorithms return empty path for unsolvable maze
Req 7,8,9: path has correct adjacency, passability, and endpoints
Req 10,11,12: player moves correctly and respects walls/bounds
Req 13,14,15,16: game state, winning, and position bounds
Req 17: complete game flow from generation to winning
Req 18: all AI algorithms work correctly
Req 19: Jest framework and position validation work
